snippet: The Treasury Department said that an obscure law, meant to apply to commemorative coins, was not to be used to produce a trillion-dollar coin.
abstract: Treasury Department says it will not mint trillion-dollar platinum coin to head off imminent battle with Congress over raising government's debt limit; says obscure law is meant to apply only to commemorative coins.
lead_paragraph: The Treasury Department said that an obscure law, meant to apply to commemorative coins, was not to be used to produce a trillion-dollar coin.

headline.seo: Treasury Will Not Mint $1 Trillion Coin to Raise Debt Ceiling
headline.main: Treasury Won’t Mint Coin to Defy Debt Ceiling
headline.print_headline: Treasury Won’t Mint Coin to Defy Debt Ceiling
